1.title: Learn Something New
1.plot: Anita Kapoor enlists in the Royal Thai Army in the premiere of this series spotlighting rejuvenating activities and destinations around the world. Also: Dominic Bonuccelli visits Sichuan, China, to learn kung fu.

2.title: Cultural Odyssey
2.plot: Dominic tries his hand at herding yak in Kham, Tibet; Anita visits a remote village in Thailand.

3.title: Adrenaline Rush
3.plot: Anita encounters great white sharks off the South Australian coast; Dominic seeks thrills on China's Yangtze River.

4.title: Conservation
4.plot: Anita visits Asian elephants in Northern Thailand and gets a lesson in conservation; Dominic volunteers to work with endangered marine turtles in Sri Lanka.

5.title: Food Safari
5.plot: Anita samples regional cuisine in Chengdu, the capital city of Sichuan, China. Also: Dominic studies the history of colonial tea planters in Sri Lanka.

6.title: A Day in the Life of...
6.plot: Dominic experiences Bollywood singing and dancing in Mumbai; Anita herds cattle in the Australian outback.

7.title: Retreat
7.plot: Anita cruises aboard a river liner on China's Yangtze River; Dominic seeks royal luxury in Rajasthan, India.

8.title: Iconic Journeys
8.plot: Anita travels on the Ghan passenger train in Australia; Dominic Bonuccelli sails on a rice barge in South India.

imdb.plot outline: We spend so much time caught up in our daily routines that it's important we bust loose every now and again, relax, de-stress and do something different. Enter Lonely Planet's Stressbuster: showcasing inspirational short breaks that offer a new perspective on life. Whether you're looking for spiritual solace or natural highs, a warm inner glow or a burst of adrenalin to blow the cobwebs away, intrepid presenters Dominic Bonuccelli and Anita Kapoor will brave high seas and rugged canyons to find it for you.
imdb.title: Lonely Planet: Stressbuster
plot: Rejuvenating activities and vacation destinations around the world are spotlighted.::TV Guide

We spend so much time caught up in our daily routines that it's important we bust loose every now and again, relax, de-stress and do something different. Enter Lonely Planet's Stressbuster: showcasing inspirational short breaks that offer a new perspective on life. Whether you're looking for spiritual solace or natural highs, a warm inner glow or a burst of adrenalin to blow the cobwebs away, intrepid presenters Dominic Bonuccelli and Anita Kapoor will brave high seas and rugged canyons to find it for you.::Beach House Pictures
